location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 29/4 Application for British Nationality by Persian Shaikhs'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a translation of a letter in which Shaikh Yasr bin Mathkoor Nasuri requests assistance from Shaikh Salmān bin Ḥamad Āl Khalīfah, the Ruler of Bahrain.The file also contains a letter from Charles Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, to Captain Hugh Dunstan Rance, Political Agent in Bahrain that states the reason behind the Shaikh Yasr's letter was his ultimate desire to obtain British nationality.
